sentences.sentence: In addition, family reunions frequently attract blood relatives from faraway places who spend considerable money and time to reunite.
sentences.translation: 此外，家庭团聚经常会吸引远方来的血亲，他们会花费大量的金钱和时间来团聚。

sentences.sentence: By the end of the 19th century, most 4-year institutions were holding alumni reunions.
sentences.translation: 到19世纪末，大多数4年制大学都举办了校友聚会。

sentences.sentence: In an effort to enhance this common identity, larger colleges and universities frequently build their class reunions on participation in smaller units, such as departments or schools.
sentences.translation: 为了加强这一共同特征，较大的学院和大学经常在较小的单位，如系或学校的参与下举办班级聚会。
